align all plots vertically so we can compare the movement on each variable. The plot subject()
function below implements this behavior for the X and y data for a single subject. The function
assumes the same order of the variables (3rd axis) as was loaded in the load dataset() function.
A crude title is also added to each plot so we donâ€™t get easily confused about what we are
